p: Data fitting between PRNT 50 and FNT 50 values on anti-ZIKBeHMR-2 immune sera revealed a linear relationship (RÂ² = 0.90, p-value <0.0001) between the two assays ( Figure 4). This indicates a concordance between conventional PRNT and a FNT method based on a single infection round. Such results support the utilization of MR766 GFP-based FNT for measuring ZIKV-neutralizing antibodies in serum specimens.
